fulltext:
Lâm Đạo Cường - Senior Software Developer  
|
 | Ho Chi Minh City, Viet Nam 
Summary  
Passionate Software Engineer with 8+ years of experience, especially in .NET, NodeJS stack and Web 
Development. Able to work with team or myself perfectly to develop features and resolve problems. 
Willing to learn and adapt new technology to the work and sharing with others is my happiness. 
Skills & Abilities  
# Languages: C#, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, TypeScript, Dart, NodeJS. 
# Databases: MS SQL, MySQL, Mongo DB. 
# Unit test: Jest, Nunit, Xunit. 
# Cloud: AWS (S3, CloudFront, Lambda, EC2, Elasticsearch ...). 
# Source Control: GIT, SVN. 
# Business: Ecommerce, Search Engine, Logistics. 
# Security thinking, problem solving, debugging. 
# Independent and team working.  
Experience  
ECOE, Ho Chi Minh City, January – 2019 - present. 
Senior software engineer  
ECOE is start-up company provide a website and  platform for realstate brokers. 
Activities:  Analysis requirement, code feature search utilities, set up CI/CD for NodeJS (Backend - 
Server), research and trainning team about GraphQL Apollo (Server – Client).  
Achievements: Learn about ReactJS, GraphQL Apollo. 
Main technologies:  NodeJS, ReactJS. 
Esilicon Corporation, Ho Chi Minh City, March 2016 – 2019. 
Senior software engineer  
Activities:  Worked as Full Stack Engineer, maintained and resolved performance Web application using 
NodeJS, Angular 7, React JS, MySQL, MongoDB. Setup CI/CD using GitLab. 
Achievements: Learn about Flutter, Linux, Node JS, React JS, Docker. 
Main technologies: NodeJS, ReactJS, Flutter. 
Silicon Prime, 2012 – 2016 
Senior Full-stack Web Developer  
Activities: Develop company and customer website. 
Achievements: ASP.Net MVC (3-4-5), HTML, JavaScript, Kendo UI, jQuery. 
Main technologies: ASP.Net MVC, SQL, jQuery. 
Education : 
Sai Gon Technology University: Bachelor of Software Engineering 2007 – 2011. 
Aptech Academy Certificate: 2010 – 2012. 
Languages:  
English, Vietnamese.

educations.major_categories: Máy tính và công nghệ thông tin
